Type.Name: NotifyType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NotifyType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary:
Specifies the kind of crossing for
See the X11 protocol specification of LeaveNotify for full details of crossing event generation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.NotifyType Ancestor = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The window is entered from an ancestor or left towards an ancestor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.NotifyType Inferior = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The window is entered from an inferior or left towards an inferior.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.NotifyType Nonlinear = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The window is entered from or left towards a window which is neither an ancestor nor an inferior.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.NotifyType NonlinearVirtual = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The pointer moves between two windows which are not ancestors of each other and the window is part of the ancestor chain between one of these windows and their least common ancestor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.NotifyType Unknown = int32(5)
.field public static literal valuetype Gdk.NotifyType Virtual = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The pointer moves between an ancestor and an inferior of the window.
